synthesis_conditions.temperature: Room temperature for initial steps, specific temperature not mentioned for reduction step

chemicals_used.amount: 8.71 g, 0.010 mol for large scale synthesis of NiII2{NiII4[CuII2(Me3mpba)2]3} · 54H2O (2)

amount: 1.94 g, 0.0067 mol for additional amount in large scale synthesis

chemicals_used.amount: 0.004 mmol for synthesis of [PdII(NH3)4][PdII2(µ-O)(NH3)6(NH4)2]0.5{NiII4[CuII2(Me3mpba)2]3} · 52H2O (3), 3.43 g, 14.0 mmol for large scale

chemicals_used.name: NaBH4
chemicals_used.amount: Excess, divided into 26 fractions, each fraction consisting of 1 mole of NaBH4 per mole of compound 3

synthesis_conditions.drying_method: Filtered on paper, specific drying method after filtration not mentioned
synthesis_conditions.additional_information: The synthesis involves multiple steps including transmetallation and post-synthetic exchange of nickel(II) cations with [PdII(NH3)4]2+ followed by a reduction process.
